items.name: auth
items.title: Auth
items.description: Displays the user login status and allows them sign in using different social identities.

items.name: counter
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Count API and provides a simple live updating number.

items.name: facepile
items.description: Displays users (actors) returned in any activity stream and displays a live updating collection of avatars and names.

items.name: stream
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Search API and displays live updating search results in a standard 'news feed' style format.

items.name: submit
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Submit API and provides a simple 'submit/comment form' style interaction.

items.name: reply-plugin
items.title: Reply
items.description: The plugin adds extra “Reply” button to each item in the Stream app. Integrates Submit app and provides the ability to reply to the posted items.

items.name: like-plugin
items.title: Like
items.description: The plugin adds extra Like/Unlike buttons to each item in the Stream app for authenticated users.

items.name: community-flag-plugin
items.title: CommunityFlag
items.description: The plugin adds extra Flag/Unflag buttons to each item in the Echo Stream app for authenticated users.

items.name: text-counter-plugin
items.title: TextCounter
items.description: The plugin adds the character counter under the text field in the Submit app. Allows to set the maximum length of the text to enter.

items.name: janrain-auth-plugin
items.title: JanrainAuth
items.description: Janrain Social Sign-in Widget integration with Echo Submit Control.

items.name: janrain-sharing-plugin-submit
items.title: JanrainSharing for Submit
items.description: Plugin provides the ability to load Janrain sharing dialog after the item has been posted using the Echo Submit control.

items.name: janrain-sharing-plugin-stream
items.title: JanrainSharing for Stream
items.description: Plugin provides the ability to load Janrain sharing dialog clicking the "Share" button in the item.

items.name: comments-sample
items.title: Comments (Reference)
items.description: Example of a simple app built using the "How to develop an app" guide.
